parsedExamples.example: 家傳秘方 / 家传秘方  ―  jiāchuán mìfāng  ―  secret recipe of a family
祖傳秘方 / 祖传秘方  ―  zǔchuán mìfāng  ―  recipe handed down from one's ancestors
